name: piral-inspector
description: A DevTools extension for Piral instances and their pilets.
author: smapiot

scripts.watch:firefox: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:parcel -- --out-dir dist/firefox" "npm run watch:web-ext -- -s dist/firefox -t firefox-desktop"
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build:parcel -- --out-dir dist/firefox && npm run build:web-ext -- -s dist/firefox -a web-ext-artifacts/firefox
scripts.deploy:firefox: rm -rf dist/firefox && npm run build:firefox && shipit firefox dist/firefox
scripts.watch:chrome: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:parcel -- --out-dir dist/chrome" "npm run watch:web-ext -- -s dist/chrome -t chromium"
scripts.build:chrome: npm run build:parcel -- --out-dir dist/chrome && npm run build:web-ext -- -s dist/chrome -a web-ext-artifacts/chrome
scripts.deploy:chrome: rm -rf dist/chrome && npm run build:chrome && shipit chrome dist/chrome
scripts.watch:opera: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:parcel -- --out-dir dist/opera" "npm run watch:web-ext -- -s dist/opera -t chromium"
scripts.build:opera: npm run build:parcel -- --out-dir dist/opera && npm run build:web-ext -- -s dist/opera -a web-ext-artifacts/opera
scripts.deploy:opera: rm -rf dist/opera && npm run build:opera && shipit opera dist/opera
